about.description: We are a team of students working on our final project to create a smart irrigation system. The goal is to automate and optimize plant watering for households, making plant care easier and more efficient.
featuresList: Automated watering system based on sensor data
Flexible configuration of watering times and amounts
Sensor integration for soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and brightness
Notification system (Email) for watering and system errors
about.outcomeDescription: By the end of the project, we will have a fully functional prototype of the smart irrigation system, capable of controlling watering remotely, logging watering actions, and providing detailed sensor readings.
about.projectGoalDescription: The goal of this project is to develop a smart irrigation system that allows efficient and automated watering of plants. The system should be flexible and allow users to configure watering times, amounts, and have remote access via a web interface.
technologiesList: Frontend: Vue.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Rust (BFF), Python microservices for sensor data and email validation
Microcontrollers: ESP32 with sensors (temperature, humidity, soil moisture, brightness), pump
Communication: Solace messaging between microcontrollers and microservices
about.title: About Us

q1.answer: This app helps home gardeners efficiently water their plants. Using sensors (soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and brightness) and an integrated pump, irrigation can be automated.
q1.question: What does this app do?

q2.answer: Plants belong to a room, which is part of an apartment. An apartment can have multiple members. You can invite others using an invite link valid for 7 days.
q2.question: How is the system organized?

q3.answer: No. You can add plants without a sensor, but sensors provide additional data for automation.
q3.question: Does every plant need a sensor?

q4.answer: Yes, using an invite link. It's valid for 7 days. Invited users can view and edit all plants in the apartment.
q4.question: Can I invite other people?

q5.answer: You can configure watering times and amounts, or enable automation. The system uses sensor data and/or weather forecasts for intelligent control.
q5.question: How does the irrigation work?

q6.answer: Yes, there's a log showing when and how much water each plant received – ideal for monitoring and optimization.
q6.question: Can I view past watering events?

q7.answer: Yes! The app is web-based and works on any internet-enabled device – phone, tablet, or laptop.
q7.question: Can I control the system remotely?

q8.answer: You can enable notifications – e.g., when watering is complete or if there are system errors.
q8.question: Are there notifications?

settings.targetValuesInfo: When enabled, you can define target values for temperature, brightness, humidity, and soil moisture. The pump will be activated automatically if the soil moisture falls below your defined threshold.

access.text: Only members of your group (apartment) can access shared plants and sensors. Your data is never shared with third parties.

dataCollected.title: What data is stored?

privacy.intro: Protecting your data is important to us. This app only collects the necessary information to ensure the proper functioning of the smart irrigation system.

security.text: The app uses modern security practices and does not store any sensitive data (like passwords) in plain text.
security.title: How is my data protected?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

usage.text: Data is only used for operating the system — automating irrigation, displaying plant info, and showing past activity.
usage.title: How is the data used?

register.SpecialCharRequired: The password must contain at least one special character (!"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?[]^_{}|~).
register.UppercaseRequired: The password must contain at least one capital letter.
